366          op0 += steps[4]

1536     "_cosine_cdf(x)\n"
1537     "\n"
1538     "Cumulative distribution function (CDF) of the cosine distribution::\n"
1539     "\n"
1540     "             {             0,              x < -pi\n"
1541     "    cdf(x) = { (pi + x + sin(x))/(2*pi),   -pi <= x <= pi\n"
1542     "             {             1,              x > pi\n"
1543     "\n"
1544     "Parameters\n"
1545     "----------\n"
1546     "x : array_like\n"
1547     "    `x` must contain real numbers.\n"
1548     "\n"
1549     "Returns\n"
1550     "-------\n"
1551     "scalar or ndarray\n"
1552     "    The cosine distribution CDF evaluated at `x`.")

1556 ufunc__cosine_cdf_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT

1560 ufunc__cosine_cdf_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"_cosine_cdf")

1567 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc__cosine_invcdf_loops[2]
1568 cdef void *ufunc__cosine_invcdf_ptr[4]
1569 cdef void *ufunc__cosine_invcdf_data[2]
1570 cdef char ufunc__cosine_invcdf_types[4]
1571 cdef char *ufunc__cosine_invcdf_doc = (
1572     "_cosine_invcdf(p)\n"
1573     "\n"
1574     "Inverse of the cumulative distribution function (CDF) of the cosine\n"
1575     "distribution.\n"
1576     "\n"
1577     "The CDF of the cosine distribution is::\n"
1578     "\n"
1579     "    cdf(x) = (pi + x + sin(x))/(2*pi)\n"
1580     "\n"
1581     "This function computes the inverse of cdf(x).\n"
1582     "\n"
1583     "Parameters\n"
1584     "----------\n"
1585     "p : array_like\n"
1586     "    `p` must contain real numbers in the interval ``0 <= p <= 1``.\n"
1587     "    `nan` is returned for values of `p` outside the interval [0, 1].\n"
1588     "\n"
1589     "Returns\n"
1590     "-------\n"
1591     "scalar or ndarray\n"
1592     "    The inverse of the cosine distribution CDF evaluated at `p`.")
1593 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_d__As_f_f
1594 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_d__As_d_d
1595 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
1596 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
1597 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_types[2] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
1598 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_types[3] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
1599 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_cosine_invcdf
1600 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"_cosine_invcdf")
1601 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_cosine_invcdf
1602 ufunc__cosine_invcdf_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"_cosine_invcdf")

1671 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc__hypergeom_cdf_loops[2]
1672 cdef void *ufunc__hypergeom_cdf_ptr[4]
1673 cdef void *ufunc__hypergeom_cdf_data[2]
1674 cdef char ufunc__hypergeom_cdf_types[10]
1675 cdef char *ufunc__hypergeom_cdf_doc = (
1676     "_hypergeom_cdf(x, r, N, M)\n"
1677     "\n"
1678     "Cumulative density function of hypergeometric distribution.\n"
1679     "\n"
1680     "Parameters\n"
1681     "----------\n"
1682     "x : array_like\n"
1683     "    Real-valued\n"
1684     "r, N, M : array_like\n"
1685     "    Positive, integer-valued parameter\n"
1686     "\n"
1687     "Returns\n"

3707 
3708 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_agm_loops[2]
3709 cdef void *ufunc_agm_ptr[4]
3710 cdef void *ufunc_agm_data[2]
3711 cdef char ufunc_agm_types[6]
3712 cdef char *ufunc_agm_doc = (
3713     "agm(a, b, out=None)\n"
3714     "\n"
3715     "Compute the arithmetic-geometric mean of `a` and `b`.\n"
3716     "\n"
3717     "Start with a_0 = a and b_0 = b and iteratively compute::\n"
3718     "\n"
3719     "    a_{n+1} = (a_n + b_n)/2\n"
3720     "    b_{n+1} = sqrt(a_n*b_n)\n"
3721     "\n"
3722     "a_n and b_n converge to the same limit as n increases; their common\n"
3723     "limit is agm(a, b).\n"
3724     "\n"
3725     "Parameters\n"
3726     "----------\n"
3727     "a, b : array_like\n"
3728     "    Real values only. If the values are both negative, the result\n"
3729     "    is negative. If one value is negative and the other is positive,\n"
3730     "    `nan` is returned.\n"
3731     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
3732     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
3733     "\n"
3734     "Returns\n"
3735     "-------\n"
3736     "scalar or ndarray\n"
3737     "    The arithmetic-geometric mean of `a` and `b`.\n"
3738     "\n"
3739     "Examples\n"
3740     "--------\n"
3741     ">>> import numpy as np\n"
3742     ">>> from scipy.special import agm\n"
3743     ">>> a, b = 24.0, 6.0\n"
3744     ">>> agm(a, b)\n"
3745     "13.458171481725614\n"
3746     "\n"
3747     "Compare that result to the iteration:\n"
3748     "\n"
3749     ">>> while a != b:\n"
3750     "...     a, b = (a + b)/2, np.sqrt(a*b)\n"
3751     "...     print(\"a = %19.16f  b=%19.16f\" % (a, b))\n"
3752     "...\n"
3753     "a = 15.0000000000000000  b=12.0000000000000000\n"
3754     "a = 13.5000000000000000  b=13.4164078649987388\n"
3755     "a = 13.4582039324993694  b=13.4581390309909850\n"
3756     "a = 13.4581714817451772  b=13.4581714817060547\n"
3757     "a = 13.4581714817256159  b=13.4581714817256159\n"
3758     "\n"
3759     "When array-like arguments are given, broadcasting applies:\n"
3760     "\n"
3761     ">>> a = np.array([[1.5], [3], [6]])  # a has shape (3, 1).\n"
3762     ">>> b = np.array([6, 12, 24, 48])    # b has shape (4,).\n"
3763     ">>> agm(a, b)\n"
3764     "array([[  3.36454287,   5.42363427,   9.05798751,  15.53650756],\n"
3765     "       [  4.37037309,   6.72908574,  10.84726853,  18.11597502],\n"
3766     "       [  6.        ,   8.74074619,  13.45817148,  21.69453707]])")
3767 ufunc_agm_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_ff_f
3768 ufunc_agm_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_dd_d
3769 ufunc_agm_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3770 ufunc_agm_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3771 ufunc_agm_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3772 ufunc_agm_types[3] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3773 ufunc_agm_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3774 ufunc_agm_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3775 ufunc_agm_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_agm
3776 ufunc_agm_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"agm")
3777 ufunc_agm_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_agm
3778 ufunc_agm_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"agm")
3779 ufunc_agm_data[0] = &ufunc_agm_ptr[2*0]
3780 ufunc_agm_data[1] = &ufunc_agm_ptr[2*1]
3781 agm = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_agm_loops, ufunc_agm_data, ufunc_agm_types, 2, 2, 1, 0, "agm", ufunc_agm_doc, 0)
3782 
3783 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_bdtr_loops[3]
3784 cdef void *ufunc_bdtr_ptr[6]
3785 cdef void *ufunc_bdtr_data[3]
3786 cdef char ufunc_bdtr_types[12]
3787 cdef char *ufunc_bdtr_doc = (
3788     "bdtr(k, n, p, out=None)\n"
3789     "\n"
3790     "Binomial distribution cumulative distribution function.\n"
3791     "\n"
3792     "Sum of the terms 0 through `floor(k)` of the Binomial probability density.\n"
3793     "\n"
3794     ".. math::\n"
3795     "    \\mathrm{bdtr}(k, n, p) =\n"
3796     "    \\sum_{j=0}^{\\lfloor k \\rfloor} {{n}\\choose{j}} p^j (1-p)^{n-j}\n"
3797     "\n"
3798     "Parameters\n"
3799     "----------\n"
3800     "k : array_like\n"
3801     "    Number of successes (double), rounded down to the nearest integer.\n"
3802     "n : array_like\n"
3803     "    Number of events (int).\n"
3804     "p : array_like\n"
3805     "    Probability of success in a single event (float).\n"
3806     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
3807     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
3808     "\n"
3809     "Returns\n"
3810     "-------\n"
3811     "y : scalar or ndarray\n"
3812     "    Probability of `floor(k)` or fewer successes in `n` independent events with\n"
3813     "    success probabilities of `p`.\n"
3814     "\n"
3815     "Notes\n"
3816     "-----\n"
3817     "The terms are not summed directly; instead the regularized incomplete beta\n"
3818     "function is employed, according to the formula,\n"
3819     "\n"
3820     ".. math::\n"
3821     "    \\mathrm{bdtr}(k, n, p) =\n"
3822     "    I_{1 - p}(n - \\lfloor k \\rfloor, \\lfloor k \\rfloor + 1).\n"
3823     "\n"
3824     "Wrapper for the Cephes [1]_ routine `bdtr`.\n"
3825     "\n"
3826     "References\n"
3827     "----------\n"
3828     ".. [1] Cephes Mathematical Functions Library,\n"
3829     "       http://www.netlib.org/cephes/")
3830 ufunc_bdtr_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
3831 ufunc_bdtr_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dpd__As_dpd_d
3832 ufunc_bdtr_loops[2] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
3833 ufunc_bdtr_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3834 ufunc_bdtr_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3835 ufunc_bdtr_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3836 ufunc_bdtr_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3837 ufunc_bdtr_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3838 ufunc_bdtr_types[5] = <char>NPY_INTP
3839 ufunc_bdtr_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3840 ufunc_bdtr_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3841 ufunc_bdtr_types[8] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3842 ufunc_bdtr_types[9] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3843 ufunc_bdtr_types[10] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3844 ufunc_bdtr_types[11] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3845 ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_bdtr_unsafe
3846 ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtr")
3847 ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_cephes_bdtr_wrap
3848 ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtr")
3849 ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*2] = <void*>_func_bdtr_unsafe
3850 ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*2+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtr")
3851 ufunc_bdtr_data[0] = &ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*0]
3852 ufunc_bdtr_data[1] = &ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*1]
3853 ufunc_bdtr_data[2] = &ufunc_bdtr_ptr[2*2]
3854 bdtr = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_bdtr_loops, ufunc_bdtr_data, ufunc_bdtr_types, 3, 3, 1, 0, "bdtr", ufunc_bdtr_doc, 0)
3855 
3856 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_bdtrc_loops[3]
3857 cdef void *ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[6]
3858 cdef void *ufunc_bdtrc_data[3]
3859 cdef char ufunc_bdtrc_types[12]
3860 cdef char *ufunc_bdtrc_doc = (
3861     "bdtrc(k, n, p, out=None)\n"
3862     "\n"
3863     "Binomial distribution survival function.\n"
3864     "\n"
3865     "Sum of the terms `floor(k) + 1` through `n` of the binomial probability\n"
3866     "density,\n"
3867     "\n"
3868     ".. math::\n"
3869     "    \\mathrm{bdtrc}(k, n, p) =\n"
3870     "    \\sum_{j=\\lfloor k \\rfloor +1}^n {{n}\\choose{j}} p^j (1-p)^{n-j}\n"
3871     "\n"
3872     "Parameters\n"
3873     "----------\n"
3874     "k : array_like\n"
3875     "    Number of successes (double), rounded down to nearest integer.\n"
3876     "n : array_like\n"
3877     "    Number of events (int)\n"
3878     "p : array_like\n"
3879     "    Probability of success in a single event.\n"
3880     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
3881     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
3882     "\n"
3883     "Returns\n"
3884     "-------\n"
3885     "y : scalar or ndarray\n"
3886     "    Probability of `floor(k) + 1` or more successes in `n` independent\n"
3887     "    events with success probabilities of `p`.\n"
3888     "\n"
3889     "See Also\n"
3890     "--------\n"
3891     "bdtr\n"
3892     "betainc\n"
3893     "\n"
3894     "Notes\n"
3895     "-----\n"
3896     "The terms are not summed directly; instead the regularized incomplete beta\n"
3897     "function is employed, according to the formula,\n"
3898     "\n"
3899     ".. math::\n"
3900     "    \\mathrm{bdtrc}(k, n, p) = I_{p}(\\lfloor k \\rfloor + 1, n - \\lfloor k \\rfloor).\n"
3901     "\n"
3902     "Wrapper for the Cephes [1]_ routine `bdtrc`.\n"
3903     "\n"
3904     "References\n"
3905     "----------\n"
3906     ".. [1] Cephes Mathematical Functions Library,\n"
3907     "       http://www.netlib.org/cephes/")
3908 ufunc_bdtrc_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
3909 ufunc_bdtrc_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dpd__As_dpd_d
3910 ufunc_bdtrc_loops[2] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
3911 ufunc_bdtrc_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3912 ufunc_bdtrc_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3913 ufunc_bdtrc_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3914 ufunc_bdtrc_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3915 ufunc_bdtrc_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3916 ufunc_bdtrc_types[5] = <char>NPY_INTP
3917 ufunc_bdtrc_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3918 ufunc_bdtrc_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3919 ufunc_bdtrc_types[8] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3920 ufunc_bdtrc_types[9] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3921 ufunc_bdtrc_types[10] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3922 ufunc_bdtrc_types[11] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3923 ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_bdtrc_unsafe
3924 ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtrc")
3925 ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_cephes_bdtrc_wrap
3926 ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtrc")
3927 ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*2] = <void*>_func_bdtrc_unsafe
3928 ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*2+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtrc")
3929 ufunc_bdtrc_data[0] = &ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*0]
3930 ufunc_bdtrc_data[1] = &ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*1]
3931 ufunc_bdtrc_data[2] = &ufunc_bdtrc_ptr[2*2]
3932 bdtrc = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_bdtrc_loops, ufunc_bdtrc_data, ufunc_bdtrc_types, 3, 3, 1, 0, "bdtrc", ufunc_bdtrc_doc, 0)
3933 
3934 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_bdtri_loops[3]
3935 cdef void *ufunc_bdtri_ptr[6]
3936 cdef void *ufunc_bdtri_data[3]
3937 cdef char ufunc_bdtri_types[12]
3938 cdef char *ufunc_bdtri_doc = (
3939     "bdtri(k, n, y, out=None)\n"
3940     "\n"
3941     "Inverse function to `bdtr` with respect to `p`.\n"
3942     "\n"
3943     "Finds the event probability `p` such that the sum of the terms 0 through\n"
3944     "`k` of the binomial probability density is equal to the given cumulative\n"
3945     "probability `y`.\n"
3946     "\n"
3947     "Parameters\n"
3948     "----------\n"
3949     "k : array_like\n"
3950     "    Number of successes (float), rounded down to the nearest integer.\n"
3951     "n : array_like\n"
3952     "    Number of events (float)\n"
3953     "y : array_like\n"
3954     "    Cumulative probability (probability of `k` or fewer successes in `n`\n"
3955     "    events).\n"
3956     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
3957     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
3958     "\n"
3959     "Returns\n"
3960     "-------\n"
3961     "p : scalar or ndarray\n"
3962     "    The event probability such that `bdtr(\\lfloor k \\rfloor, n, p) = y`.\n"
3963     "\n"
3964     "See Also\n"
3965     "--------\n"
3966     "bdtr\n"
3967     "betaincinv\n"
3968     "\n"
3969     "Notes\n"
3970     "-----\n"
3971     "The computation is carried out using the inverse beta integral function\n"
3972     "and the relation,::\n"
3973     "\n"
3974     "    1 - p = betaincinv(n - k, k + 1, y).\n"
3975     "\n"
3976     "Wrapper for the Cephes [1]_ routine `bdtri`.\n"
3977     "\n"
3978     "References\n"
3979     "----------\n"
3980     ".. [1] Cephes Mathematical Functions Library,\n"
3981     "       http://www.netlib.org/cephes/")
3982 ufunc_bdtri_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
3983 ufunc_bdtri_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dpd__As_dpd_d
3984 ufunc_bdtri_loops[2] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
3985 ufunc_bdtri_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3986 ufunc_bdtri_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3987 ufunc_bdtri_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3988 ufunc_bdtri_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
3989 ufunc_bdtri_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3990 ufunc_bdtri_types[5] = <char>NPY_INTP
3991 ufunc_bdtri_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3992 ufunc_bdtri_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3993 ufunc_bdtri_types[8] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3994 ufunc_bdtri_types[9] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3995 ufunc_bdtri_types[10] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3996 ufunc_bdtri_types[11] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
3997 ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_bdtri_unsafe
3998 ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtri")
3999 ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_cephes_bdtri_wrap
4000 ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtri")
4001 ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*2] = <void*>_func_bdtri_unsafe
4002 ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*2+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtri")
4003 ufunc_bdtri_data[0] = &ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*0]
4004 ufunc_bdtri_data[1] = &ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*1]
4005 ufunc_bdtri_data[2] = &ufunc_bdtri_ptr[2*2]
4006 bdtri = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_bdtri_loops, ufunc_bdtri_data, ufunc_bdtri_types, 3, 3, 1, 0, "bdtri", ufunc_bdtri_doc, 0)
4007 
4008 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_bdtrik_loops[2]
4009 cdef void *ufunc_bdtrik_ptr[4]
4010 cdef void *ufunc_bdtrik_data[2]
4011 cdef char ufunc_bdtrik_types[8]
4012 cdef char *ufunc_bdtrik_doc = (
4013     "bdtrik(y, n, p, out=None)\n"
4014     "\n"
4015     "Inverse function to `bdtr` with respect to `k`.\n"
4016     "\n"
4017     "Finds the number of successes `k` such that the sum of the terms 0 through\n"
4018     "`k` of the Binomial probability density for `n` events with probability\n"
4019     "`p` is equal to the given cumulative probability `y`.\n"
4020     "\n"
4021     "Parameters\n"
4022     "----------\n"
4023     "y : array_like\n"
4024     "    Cumulative probability (probability of `k` or fewer successes in `n`\n"
4025     "    events).\n"
4026     "n : array_like\n"
4027     "    Number of events (float).\n"
4028     "p : array_like\n"
4029     "    Success probability (float).\n"
4030     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4031     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4032     "\n"
4033     "Returns\n"
4034     "-------\n"
4035     "k : scalar or ndarray\n"
4036     "    The number of successes `k` such that `bdtr(k, n, p) = y`.\n"
4037     "\n"
4038     "See Also\n"
4039     "--------\n"
4040     "bdtr\n"
4041     "\n"
4042     "Notes\n"
4043     "-----\n"
4044     "Formula 26.5.24 of [1]_ is used to reduce the binomial distribution to the\n"
4045     "cumulative incomplete beta distribution.\n"
4046     "\n"
4047     "Computation of `k` involves a search for a value that produces the desired\n"
4048     "value of `y`. The search relies on the monotonicity of `y` with `k`.\n"
4049     "\n"
4050     "Wrapper for the CDFLIB [2]_ Fortran routine `cdfbin`.\n"
4051     "\n"
4052     "References\n"
4053     "----------\n"
4054     ".. [1] Milton Abramowitz and Irene A. Stegun, eds.\n"
4055     "       Handbook of Mathematical Functions with Formulas,\n"
4056     "       Graphs, and Mathematical Tables. New York: Dover, 1972.\n"
4057     ".. [2] Barry Brown, James Lovato, and Kathy Russell,\n"
4058     "       CDFLIB: Library of Fortran Routines for Cumulative Distribution\n"
4059     "       Functions, Inverses, and Other Parameters.")
4060 ufunc_bdtrik_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
4061 ufunc_bdtrik_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4062 ufunc_bdtrik_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4063 ufunc_bdtrik_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4064 ufunc_bdtrik_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4065 ufunc_bdtrik_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4066 ufunc_bdtrik_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4067 ufunc_bdtrik_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4068 ufunc_bdtrik_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4069 ufunc_bdtrik_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4070 ufunc_bdtrik_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_bdtrik
4071 ufunc_bdtrik_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtrik")
4072 ufunc_bdtrik_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_bdtrik
4073 ufunc_bdtrik_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtrik")
4074 ufunc_bdtrik_data[0] = &ufunc_bdtrik_ptr[2*0]
4075 ufunc_bdtrik_data[1] = &ufunc_bdtrik_ptr[2*1]
4076 bdtrik = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_bdtrik_loops, ufunc_bdtrik_data, ufunc_bdtrik_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "bdtrik", ufunc_bdtrik_doc, 0)
4077 
4078 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_bdtrin_loops[2]
4079 cdef void *ufunc_bdtrin_ptr[4]
4080 cdef void *ufunc_bdtrin_data[2]
4081 cdef char ufunc_bdtrin_types[8]
4082 cdef char *ufunc_bdtrin_doc = (
4083     "bdtrin(k, y, p, out=None)\n"
4084     "\n"
4085     "Inverse function to `bdtr` with respect to `n`.\n"
4086     "\n"
4087     "Finds the number of events `n` such that the sum of the terms 0 through\n"
4088     "`k` of the Binomial probability density for events with probability `p` is\n"
4089     "equal to the given cumulative probability `y`.\n"
4090     "\n"
4091     "Parameters\n"
4092     "----------\n"
4093     "k : array_like\n"
4094     "    Number of successes (float).\n"
4095     "y : array_like\n"
4096     "    Cumulative probability (probability of `k` or fewer successes in `n`\n"
4097     "    events).\n"
4098     "p : array_like\n"
4099     "    Success probability (float).\n"
4100     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4101     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4102     "\n"
4103     "Returns\n"
4104     "-------\n"
4105     "n : scalar or ndarray\n"
4106     "    The number of events `n` such that `bdtr(k, n, p) = y`.\n"
4107     "\n"
4108     "See Also\n"
4109     "--------\n"
4110     "bdtr\n"
4111     "\n"
4112     "Notes\n"
4113     "-----\n"
4114     "Formula 26.5.24 of [1]_ is used to reduce the binomial distribution to the\n"
4115     "cumulative incomplete beta distribution.\n"
4116     "\n"
4117     "Computation of `n` involves a search for a value that produces the desired\n"
4118     "value of `y`. The search relies on the monotonicity of `y` with `n`.\n"
4119     "\n"
4120     "Wrapper for the CDFLIB [2]_ Fortran routine `cdfbin`.\n"
4121     "\n"
4122     "References\n"
4123     "----------\n"
4124     ".. [1] Milton Abramowitz and Irene A. Stegun, eds.\n"
4125     "       Handbook of Mathematical Functions with Formulas,\n"
4126     "       Graphs, and Mathematical Tables. New York: Dover, 1972.\n"
4127     ".. [2] Barry Brown, James Lovato, and Kathy Russell,\n"
4128     "       CDFLIB: Library of Fortran Routines for Cumulative Distribution\n"
4129     "       Functions, Inverses, and Other Parameters.")
4130 ufunc_bdtrin_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
4131 ufunc_bdtrin_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4132 ufunc_bdtrin_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4133 ufunc_bdtrin_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4134 ufunc_bdtrin_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4135 ufunc_bdtrin_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4136 ufunc_bdtrin_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4137 ufunc_bdtrin_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4138 ufunc_bdtrin_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4139 ufunc_bdtrin_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4140 ufunc_bdtrin_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_bdtrin
4141 ufunc_bdtrin_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtrin")
4142 ufunc_bdtrin_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_bdtrin
4143 ufunc_bdtrin_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"bdtrin")
4144 ufunc_bdtrin_data[0] = &ufunc_bdtrin_ptr[2*0]
4145 ufunc_bdtrin_data[1] = &ufunc_bdtrin_ptr[2*1]
4146 bdtrin = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_bdtrin_loops, ufunc_bdtrin_data, ufunc_bdtrin_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "bdtrin", ufunc_bdtrin_doc, 0)
4147 
4148 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_betainc_loops[2]
4149 cdef void *ufunc_betainc_ptr[4]
4150 cdef void *ufunc_betainc_data[2]
4151 cdef char ufunc_betainc_types[8]
4152 cdef char *ufunc_betainc_doc = (
4153     "betainc(a, b, x, out=None)\n"
4154     "\n"
4155     "Regularized incomplete beta function.\n"
4156     "\n"
4157     "Computes the regularized incomplete beta function, defined as [1]_:\n"
4158     "\n"
4159     ".. math::\n"
4160     "\n"
4161     "    I_x(a, b) = \\frac{\\Gamma(a+b)}{\\Gamma(a)\\Gamma(b)} \\int_0^x\n"
4162     "    t^{a-1}(1-t)^{b-1}dt,\n"
4163     "\n"
4164     "for :math:`0 \\leq x \\leq 1`.\n"
4165     "\n"
4166     "This function is the cumulative distribution function for the beta\n"
4167     "distribution; its range is [0, 1].\n"
4168     "\n"
4169     "Parameters\n"
4170     "----------\n"
4171     "a, b : array_like\n"
4172     "       Positive, real-valued parameters\n"
4173     "x : array_like\n"
4174     "    Real-valued such that :math:`0 \\leq x \\leq 1`,\n"
4175     "    the upper limit of integration\n"
4176     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4177     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4178     "\n"
4179     "Returns\n"
4180     "-------\n"
4181     "scalar or ndarray\n"
4182     "    Value of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4183     "\n"
4184     "See Also\n"
4185     "--------\n"
4186     "beta : beta function\n"
4187     "betaincinv : inverse of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4188     "betaincc : complement of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4189     "scipy.stats.beta : beta distribution\n"
4190     "\n"
4191     "Notes\n"
4192     "-----\n"
4193     "The term *regularized* in the name of this function refers to the\n"
4194     "scaling of the function by the gamma function terms shown in the\n"
4195     "formula.  When not qualified as *regularized*, the name *incomplete\n"
4196     "beta function* often refers to just the integral expression,\n"
4197     "without the gamma terms.  One can use the function `beta` from\n"
4198     "`scipy.special` to get this \"nonregularized\" incomplete beta\n"
4199     "function by multiplying the result of ``betainc(a, b, x)`` by\n"
4200     "``beta(a, b)``.\n"
4201     "\n"
4202     "This function wraps the ``ibeta`` routine from the\n"
4203     "Boost Math C++ library [2]_.\n"
4204     "\n"
4205     "References\n"
4206     "----------\n"
4207     ".. [1] NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions\n"
4208     "       https://dlmf.nist.gov/8.17\n"
4209     ".. [2] The Boost Developers. \"Boost C++ Libraries\". https://www.boost.org/.\n"
4210     "\n"
4211     "Examples\n"
4212     "--------\n"
4213     "\n"
4214     "Let :math:`B(a, b)` be the `beta` function.\n"
4215     "\n"
4216     ">>> import scipy.special as sc\n"
4217     "\n"
4218     "The coefficient in terms of `gamma` is equal to\n"
4219     ":math:`1/B(a, b)`. Also, when :math:`x=1`\n"
4220     "the integral is equal to :math:`B(a, b)`.\n"
4221     "Therefore, :math:`I_{x=1}(a, b) = 1` for any :math:`a, b`.\n"
4222     "\n"
4223     ">>> sc.betainc(0.2, 3.5, 1.0)\n"
4224     "1.0\n"
4225     "\n"
4226     "It satisfies\n"
4227     ":math:`I_x(a, b) = x^a F(a, 1-b, a+1, x)/ (aB(a, b))`,\n"
4228     "where :math:`F` is the hypergeometric function `hyp2f1`:\n"
4229     "\n"
4230     ">>> a, b, x = 1.4, 3.1, 0.5\n"
4231     ">>> x**a * sc.hyp2f1(a, 1 - b, a + 1, x)/(a * sc.beta(a, b))\n"
4232     "0.8148904036225295\n"
4233     ">>> sc.betainc(a, b, x)\n"
4234     "0.8148904036225296\n"
4235     "\n"
4236     "This functions satisfies the relationship\n"
4237     ":math:`I_x(a, b) = 1 - I_{1-x}(b, a)`:\n"
4238     "\n"
4239     ">>> sc.betainc(2.2, 3.1, 0.4)\n"
4240     "0.49339638807619446\n"
4241     ">>> 1 - sc.betainc(3.1, 2.2, 1 - 0.4)\n"
4242     "0.49339638807619446")
4243 ufunc_betainc_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_f_fff__As_fff_f
4244 ufunc_betainc_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4245 ufunc_betainc_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4246 ufunc_betainc_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4247 ufunc_betainc_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4248 ufunc_betainc_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4249 ufunc_betainc_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4250 ufunc_betainc_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4251 ufunc_betainc_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4252 ufunc_betainc_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4253 ufunc_betainc_ptr[2*0] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibeta_float
4254 ufunc_betainc_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betainc")
4255 ufunc_betainc_ptr[2*1] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibeta_double
4256 ufunc_betainc_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betainc")
4257 ufunc_betainc_data[0] = &ufunc_betainc_ptr[2*0]
4258 ufunc_betainc_data[1] = &ufunc_betainc_ptr[2*1]
4259 betainc = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_betainc_loops, ufunc_betainc_data, ufunc_betainc_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "betainc", ufunc_betainc_doc, 0)
4260 
4261 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_betaincc_loops[2]
4262 cdef void *ufunc_betaincc_ptr[4]
4263 cdef void *ufunc_betaincc_data[2]
4264 cdef char ufunc_betaincc_types[8]
4265 cdef char *ufunc_betaincc_doc = (
4266     "betaincc(a, b, x, out=None)\n"
4267     "\n"
4268     "Complement of the regularized incomplete beta function.\n"
4269     "\n"
4270     "Computes the complement of the regularized incomplete beta function,\n"
4271     "defined as [1]_:\n"
4272     "\n"
4273     ".. math::\n"
4274     "\n"
4275     "    \\bar{I}_x(a, b) = 1 - I_x(a, b)\n"
4276     "                    = 1 - \\frac{\\Gamma(a+b)}{\\Gamma(a)\\Gamma(b)} \\int_0^x\n"
4277     "                              t^{a-1}(1-t)^{b-1}dt,\n"
4278     "\n"
4279     "for :math:`0 \\leq x \\leq 1`.\n"
4280     "\n"
4281     "Parameters\n"
4282     "----------\n"
4283     "a, b : array_like\n"
4284     "       Positive, real-valued parameters\n"
4285     "x : array_like\n"
4286     "    Real-valued such that :math:`0 \\leq x \\leq 1`,\n"
4287     "    the upper limit of integration\n"
4288     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4289     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4290     "\n"
4291     "Returns\n"
4292     "-------\n"
4293     "scalar or ndarray\n"
4294     "    Value of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4295     "\n"
4296     "See Also\n"
4297     "--------\n"
4298     "betainc : regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4299     "betaincinv : inverse of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4300     "betainccinv :\n"
4301     "    inverse of the complement of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4302     "beta : beta function\n"
4303     "scipy.stats.beta : beta distribution\n"
4304     "\n"
4305     "Notes\n"
4306     "-----\n"
4307     ".. versionadded:: 1.11.0\n"
4308     "\n"
4309     "This function wraps the ``ibetac`` routine from the\n"
4310     "Boost Math C++ library [2]_.\n"
4311     "\n"
4312     "References\n"
4313     "----------\n"
4314     ".. [1] NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions\n"
4315     "       https://dlmf.nist.gov/8.17\n"
4316     ".. [2] The Boost Developers. \"Boost C++ Libraries\". https://www.boost.org/.\n"
4317     "\n"
4318     "Examples\n"
4319     "--------\n"
4320     ">>> from scipy.special import betaincc, betainc\n"
4321     "\n"
4322     "The naive calculation ``1 - betainc(a, b, x)`` loses precision when\n"
4323     "the values of ``betainc(a, b, x)`` are close to 1:\n"
4324     "\n"
4325     ">>> 1 - betainc(0.5, 8, [0.9, 0.99, 0.999])\n"
4326     "array([2.0574632e-09, 0.0000000e+00, 0.0000000e+00])\n"
4327     "\n"
4328     "By using ``betaincc``, we get the correct values:\n"
4329     "\n"
4330     ">>> betaincc(0.5, 8, [0.9, 0.99, 0.999])\n"
4331     "array([2.05746321e-09, 1.97259354e-17, 1.96467954e-25])")
4332 ufunc_betaincc_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_f_fff__As_fff_f
4333 ufunc_betaincc_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4334 ufunc_betaincc_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4335 ufunc_betaincc_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4336 ufunc_betaincc_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4337 ufunc_betaincc_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4338 ufunc_betaincc_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4339 ufunc_betaincc_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4340 ufunc_betaincc_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4341 ufunc_betaincc_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4342 ufunc_betaincc_ptr[2*0] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibetac_float
4343 ufunc_betaincc_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betaincc")
4344 ufunc_betaincc_ptr[2*1] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibetac_double
4345 ufunc_betaincc_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betaincc")
4346 ufunc_betaincc_data[0] = &ufunc_betaincc_ptr[2*0]
4347 ufunc_betaincc_data[1] = &ufunc_betaincc_ptr[2*1]
4348 betaincc = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_betaincc_loops, ufunc_betaincc_data, ufunc_betaincc_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "betaincc", ufunc_betaincc_doc, 0)
4349 
4350 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_betainccinv_loops[2]
4351 cdef void *ufunc_betainccinv_ptr[4]
4352 cdef void *ufunc_betainccinv_data[2]
4353 cdef char ufunc_betainccinv_types[8]
4354 cdef char *ufunc_betainccinv_doc = (
4355     "betainccinv(a, b, y, out=None)\n"
4356     "\n"
4357     "Inverse of the complemented regularized incomplete beta function.\n"
4358     "\n"
4359     "Computes :math:`x` such that:\n"
4360     "\n"
4361     ".. math::\n"
4362     "\n"
4363     "    y = 1 - I_x(a, b) = 1 - \\frac{\\Gamma(a+b)}{\\Gamma(a)\\Gamma(b)}\n"
4364     "    \\int_0^x t^{a-1}(1-t)^{b-1}dt,\n"
4365     "\n"
4366     "where :math:`I_x` is the normalized incomplete beta function `betainc`\n"
4367     "and :math:`\\Gamma` is the `gamma` function [1]_.\n"
4368     "\n"
4369     "Parameters\n"
4370     "----------\n"
4371     "a, b : array_like\n"
4372     "    Positive, real-valued parameters\n"
4373     "y : array_like\n"
4374     "    Real-valued input\n"
4375     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4376     "    Optional output array for function values\n"
4377     "\n"
4378     "Returns\n"
4379     "-------\n"
4380     "scalar or ndarray\n"
4381     "    Value of the inverse of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4382     "\n"
4383     "See Also\n"
4384     "--------\n"
4385     "betainc : regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4386     "betaincc : complement of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4387     "\n"
4388     "Notes\n"
4389     "-----\n"
4390     ".. versionadded:: 1.11.0\n"
4391     "\n"
4392     "This function wraps the ``ibetac_inv`` routine from the\n"
4393     "Boost Math C++ library [2]_.\n"
4394     "\n"
4395     "References\n"
4396     "----------\n"
4397     ".. [1] NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions\n"
4398     "       https://dlmf.nist.gov/8.17\n"
4399     ".. [2] The Boost Developers. \"Boost C++ Libraries\". https://www.boost.org/.\n"
4400     "\n"
4401     "Examples\n"
4402     "--------\n"
4403     ">>> from scipy.special import betainccinv, betaincc\n"
4404     "\n"
4405     "This function is the inverse of `betaincc` for fixed\n"
4406     "values of :math:`a` and :math:`b`.\n"
4407     "\n"
4408     ">>> a, b = 1.2, 3.1\n"
4409     ">>> y = betaincc(a, b, 0.2)\n"
4410     ">>> betainccinv(a, b, y)\n"
4411     "0.2\n"
4412     "\n"
4413     ">>> a, b = 7, 2.5\n"
4414     ">>> x = betainccinv(a, b, 0.875)\n"
4415     ">>> betaincc(a, b, x)\n"
4416     "0.875")
4417 ufunc_betainccinv_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_f_fff__As_fff_f
4418 ufunc_betainccinv_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4419 ufunc_betainccinv_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4420 ufunc_betainccinv_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4421 ufunc_betainccinv_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4422 ufunc_betainccinv_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4423 ufunc_betainccinv_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4424 ufunc_betainccinv_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4425 ufunc_betainccinv_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4426 ufunc_betainccinv_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4427 ufunc_betainccinv_ptr[2*0] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibetac_inv_float
4428 ufunc_betainccinv_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betainccinv")
4429 ufunc_betainccinv_ptr[2*1] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibetac_inv_double
4430 ufunc_betainccinv_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betainccinv")
4431 ufunc_betainccinv_data[0] = &ufunc_betainccinv_ptr[2*0]
4432 ufunc_betainccinv_data[1] = &ufunc_betainccinv_ptr[2*1]
4433 betainccinv = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_betainccinv_loops, ufunc_betainccinv_data, ufunc_betainccinv_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "betainccinv", ufunc_betainccinv_doc, 0)
4434 
4435 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_betaincinv_loops[2]
4436 cdef void *ufunc_betaincinv_ptr[4]
4437 cdef void *ufunc_betaincinv_data[2]
4438 cdef char ufunc_betaincinv_types[8]
4439 cdef char *ufunc_betaincinv_doc = (
4440     "betaincinv(a, b, y, out=None)\n"
4441     "\n"
4442     "Inverse of the regularized incomplete beta function.\n"
4443     "\n"
4444     "Computes :math:`x` such that:\n"
4445     "\n"
4446     ".. math::\n"
4447     "\n"
4448     "    y = I_x(a, b) = \\frac{\\Gamma(a+b)}{\\Gamma(a)\\Gamma(b)}\n"
4449     "    \\int_0^x t^{a-1}(1-t)^{b-1}dt,\n"
4450     "\n"
4451     "where :math:`I_x` is the normalized incomplete beta function `betainc`\n"
4452     "and :math:`\\Gamma` is the `gamma` function [1]_.\n"
4453     "\n"
4454     "Parameters\n"
4455     "----------\n"
4456     "a, b : array_like\n"
4457     "    Positive, real-valued parameters\n"
4458     "y : array_like\n"
4459     "    Real-valued input\n"
4460     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4461     "    Optional output array for function values\n"
4462     "\n"
4463     "Returns\n"
4464     "-------\n"
4465     "scalar or ndarray\n"
4466     "    Value of the inverse of the regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4467     "\n"
4468     "See Also\n"
4469     "--------\n"
4470     "betainc : regularized incomplete beta function\n"
4471     "gamma : gamma function\n"
4472     "\n"
4473     "Notes\n"
4474     "-----\n"
4475     "This function wraps the ``ibeta_inv`` routine from the\n"
4476     "Boost Math C++ library [2]_.\n"
4477     "\n"
4478     "References\n"
4479     "----------\n"
4480     ".. [1] NIST Digital Library of Mathematical Functions\n"
4481     "       https://dlmf.nist.gov/8.17\n"
4482     ".. [2] The Boost Developers. \"Boost C++ Libraries\". https://www.boost.org/.\n"
4483     "\n"
4484     "Examples\n"
4485     "--------\n"
4486     ">>> import scipy.special as sc\n"
4487     "\n"
4488     "This function is the inverse of `betainc` for fixed\n"
4489     "values of :math:`a` and :math:`b`.\n"
4490     "\n"
4491     ">>> a, b = 1.2, 3.1\n"
4492     ">>> y = sc.betainc(a, b, 0.2)\n"
4493     ">>> sc.betaincinv(a, b, y)\n"
4494     "0.2\n"
4495     ">>>\n"
4496     ">>> a, b = 7.5, 0.4\n"
4497     ">>> x = sc.betaincinv(a, b, 0.5)\n"
4498     ">>> sc.betainc(a, b, x)\n"
4499     "0.5")
4500 ufunc_betaincinv_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_f_fff__As_fff_f
4501 ufunc_betaincinv_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4502 ufunc_betaincinv_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4503 ufunc_betaincinv_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4504 ufunc_betaincinv_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4505 ufunc_betaincinv_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4506 ufunc_betaincinv_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4507 ufunc_betaincinv_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4508 ufunc_betaincinv_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4509 ufunc_betaincinv_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4510 ufunc_betaincinv_ptr[2*0] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibeta_inv_float
4511 ufunc_betaincinv_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betaincinv")
4512 ufunc_betaincinv_ptr[2*1] = <void*>scipy.special._ufuncs_cxx._export_ibeta_inv_double
4513 ufunc_betaincinv_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"betaincinv")
4514 ufunc_betaincinv_data[0] = &ufunc_betaincinv_ptr[2*0]
4515 ufunc_betaincinv_data[1] = &ufunc_betaincinv_ptr[2*1]
4516 betaincinv = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_betaincinv_loops, ufunc_betaincinv_data, ufunc_betaincinv_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "betaincinv", ufunc_betaincinv_doc, 0)
4517 
4518 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_boxcox_loops[2]
4519 cdef void *ufunc_boxcox_ptr[4]
4520 cdef void *ufunc_boxcox_data[2]
4521 cdef char ufunc_boxcox_types[6]
4522 cdef char *ufunc_boxcox_doc = (
4523     "boxcox(x, lmbda, out=None)\n"
4524     "\n"
4525     "Compute the Box-Cox transformation.\n"
4526     "\n"
4527     "The Box-Cox transformation is::\n"
4528     "\n"
4529     "    y = (x**lmbda - 1) / lmbda  if lmbda != 0\n"
4530     "        log(x)                  if lmbda == 0\n"
4531     "\n"
4532     "Returns `nan` if ``x < 0``.\n"
4533     "Returns `-inf` if ``x == 0`` and ``lmbda < 0``.\n"
4534     "\n"
4535     "Parameters\n"
4536     "----------\n"
4537     "x : array_like\n"
4538     "    Data to be transformed.\n"
4539     "lmbda : array_like\n"
4540     "    Power parameter of the Box-Cox transform.\n"
4541     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4542     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4543     "\n"
4544     "Returns\n"
4545     "-------\n"
4546     "y : scalar or ndarray\n"
4547     "    Transformed data.\n"
4548     "\n"
4549     "Notes\n"
4550     "-----\n"
4551     "\n"
4552     ".. versionadded:: 0.14.0\n"
4553     "\n"
4554     "Examples\n"
4555     "--------\n"
4556     ">>> from scipy.special import boxcox\n"
4557     ">>> boxcox([1, 4, 10], 2.5)\n"
4558     "array([   0.        ,   12.4       ,  126.09110641])\n"
4559     ">>> boxcox(2, [0, 1, 2])\n"
4560     "array([ 0.69314718,  1.        ,  1.5       ])")
4561 ufunc_boxcox_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_ff_f
4562 ufunc_boxcox_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_dd_d
4563 ufunc_boxcox_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4564 ufunc_boxcox_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4565 ufunc_boxcox_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4566 ufunc_boxcox_types[3] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4567 ufunc_boxcox_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4568 ufunc_boxcox_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4569 ufunc_boxcox_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_boxcox
4570 ufunc_boxcox_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"boxcox")
4571 ufunc_boxcox_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_boxcox
4572 ufunc_boxcox_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"boxcox")
4573 ufunc_boxcox_data[0] = &ufunc_boxcox_ptr[2*0]
4574 ufunc_boxcox_data[1] = &ufunc_boxcox_ptr[2*1]
4575 boxcox = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_boxcox_loops, ufunc_boxcox_data, ufunc_boxcox_types, 2, 2, 1, 0, "boxcox", ufunc_boxcox_doc, 0)
4576 
4577 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_boxcox1p_loops[2]
4578 cdef void *ufunc_boxcox1p_ptr[4]
4579 cdef void *ufunc_boxcox1p_data[2]
4580 cdef char ufunc_boxcox1p_types[6]
4581 cdef char *ufunc_boxcox1p_doc = (
4582     "boxcox1p(x, lmbda, out=None)\n"
4583     "\n"
4584     "Compute the Box-Cox transformation of 1 + `x`.\n"
4585     "\n"
4586     "The Box-Cox transformation computed by `boxcox1p` is::\n"
4587     "\n"
4588     "    y = ((1+x)**lmbda - 1) / lmbda  if lmbda != 0\n"
4589     "        log(1+x)                    if lmbda == 0\n"
4590     "\n"
4591     "Returns `nan` if ``x < -1``.\n"
4592     "Returns `-inf` if ``x == -1`` and ``lmbda < 0``.\n"
4593     "\n"
4594     "Parameters\n"
4595     "----------\n"
4596     "x : array_like\n"
4597     "    Data to be transformed.\n"
4598     "lmbda : array_like\n"
4599     "    Power parameter of the Box-Cox transform.\n"
4600     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4601     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4602     "\n"
4603     "Returns\n"
4604     "-------\n"
4605     "y : scalar or ndarray\n"
4606     "    Transformed data.\n"
4607     "\n"
4608     "Notes\n"
4609     "-----\n"
4610     "\n"
4611     ".. versionadded:: 0.14.0\n"
4612     "\n"
4613     "Examples\n"
4614     "--------\n"
4615     ">>> from scipy.special import boxcox1p\n"
4616     ">>> boxcox1p(1e-4, [0, 0.5, 1])\n"
4617     "array([  9.99950003e-05,   9.99975001e-05,   1.00000000e-04])\n"
4618     ">>> boxcox1p([0.01, 0.1], 0.25)\n"
4619     "array([ 0.00996272,  0.09645476])")
4620 ufunc_boxcox1p_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_ff_f
4621 ufunc_boxcox1p_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_dd_d
4622 ufunc_boxcox1p_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4623 ufunc_boxcox1p_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4624 ufunc_boxcox1p_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4625 ufunc_boxcox1p_types[3] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4626 ufunc_boxcox1p_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4627 ufunc_boxcox1p_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4628 ufunc_boxcox1p_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_boxcox1p
4629 ufunc_boxcox1p_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"boxcox1p")
4630 ufunc_boxcox1p_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_boxcox1p
4631 ufunc_boxcox1p_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"boxcox1p")
4632 ufunc_boxcox1p_data[0] = &ufunc_boxcox1p_ptr[2*0]
4633 ufunc_boxcox1p_data[1] = &ufunc_boxcox1p_ptr[2*1]
4634 boxcox1p = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_boxcox1p_loops, ufunc_boxcox1p_data, ufunc_boxcox1p_types, 2, 2, 1, 0, "boxcox1p", ufunc_boxcox1p_doc, 0)
4635 
4636 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_btdtria_loops[2]
4637 cdef void *ufunc_btdtria_ptr[4]
4638 cdef void *ufunc_btdtria_data[2]
4639 cdef char ufunc_btdtria_types[8]
4640 cdef char *ufunc_btdtria_doc = (
4641     "btdtria(p, b, x, out=None)\n"
4642     "\n"
4643     "Inverse of `betainc` with respect to `a`.\n"
4644     "\n"
4645     "This is the inverse of the beta cumulative distribution function, `betainc`,\n"
4646     "considered as a function of `a`, returning the value of `a` for which\n"
4647     "`betainc(a, b, x) = p`, or\n"
4648     "\n"
4649     ".. math::\n"
4650     "    p = \\int_0^x \\frac{\\Gamma(a + b)}{\\Gamma(a)\\Gamma(b)} t^{a-1} (1-t)^{b-1}\\,dt\n"
4651     "\n"
4652     "Parameters\n"
4653     "----------\n"
4654     "p : array_like\n"
4655     "    Cumulative probability, in [0, 1].\n"
4656     "b : array_like\n"
4657     "    Shape parameter (`b` > 0).\n"
4658     "x : array_like\n"
4659     "    The quantile, in [0, 1].\n"
4660     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4661     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4662     "\n"
4663     "Returns\n"
4664     "-------\n"
4665     "a : scalar or ndarray\n"
4666     "    The value of the shape parameter `a` such that `betainc(a, b, x) = p`.\n"
4667     "\n"
4668     "See Also\n"
4669     "--------\n"
4670     "btdtrib : Inverse of the beta cumulative distribution function, with respect to `b`.\n"
4671     "\n"
4672     "Notes\n"
4673     "-----\n"
4674     "Wrapper for the CDFLIB [1]_ Fortran routine `cdfbet`.\n"
4675     "\n"
4676     "The cumulative distribution function `p` is computed using a routine by\n"
4677     "DiDinato and Morris [2]_. Computation of `a` involves a search for a value\n"
4678     "that produces the desired value of `p`. The search relies on the\n"
4679     "monotonicity of `p` with `a`.\n"
4680     "\n"
4681     "References\n"
4682     "----------\n"
4683     ".. [1] Barry Brown, James Lovato, and Kathy Russell,\n"
4684     "       CDFLIB: Library of Fortran Routines for Cumulative Distribution\n"
4685     "       Functions, Inverses, and Other Parameters.\n"
4686     ".. [2] DiDinato, A. R. and Morris, A. H.,\n"
4687     "       Algorithm 708: Significant Digit Computation of the Incomplete Beta\n"
4688     "       Function Ratios. ACM Trans. Math. Softw. 18 (1993), 360-373.")
4689 ufunc_btdtria_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
4690 ufunc_btdtria_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4691 ufunc_btdtria_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4692 ufunc_btdtria_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4693 ufunc_btdtria_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4694 ufunc_btdtria_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4695 ufunc_btdtria_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4696 ufunc_btdtria_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4697 ufunc_btdtria_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4698 ufunc_btdtria_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4699 ufunc_btdtria_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_btdtria
4700 ufunc_btdtria_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"btdtria")
4701 ufunc_btdtria_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_btdtria
4702 ufunc_btdtria_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"btdtria")
4703 ufunc_btdtria_data[0] = &ufunc_btdtria_ptr[2*0]
4704 ufunc_btdtria_data[1] = &ufunc_btdtria_ptr[2*1]
4705 btdtria = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_btdtria_loops, ufunc_btdtria_data, ufunc_btdtria_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "btdtria", ufunc_btdtria_doc, 0)
4706 
4707 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_btdtrib_loops[2]
4708 cdef void *ufunc_btdtrib_ptr[4]
4709 cdef void *ufunc_btdtrib_data[2]
4710 cdef char ufunc_btdtrib_types[8]
4711 cdef char *ufunc_btdtrib_doc = (
4712     "btdtria(a, p, x, out=None)\n"
4713     "\n"
4714     "Inverse of `betainc` with respect to `b`.\n"
4715     "\n"
4716     "This is the inverse of the beta cumulative distribution function, `betainc`,\n"
4717     "considered as a function of `b`, returning the value of `b` for which\n"
4718     "`betainc(a, b, x) = p`, or\n"
4719     "\n"
4720     ".. math::\n"
4721     "    p = \\int_0^x \\frac{\\Gamma(a + b)}{\\Gamma(a)\\Gamma(b)} t^{a-1} (1-t)^{b-1}\\,dt\n"
4722     "\n"
4723     "Parameters\n"
4724     "----------\n"
4725     "a : array_like\n"
4726     "    Shape parameter (`a` > 0).\n"
4727     "p : array_like\n"
4728     "    Cumulative probability, in [0, 1].\n"
4729     "x : array_like\n"
4730     "    The quantile, in [0, 1].\n"
4731     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4732     "    Optional output array for the function values\n"
4733     "\n"
4734     "Returns\n"
4735     "-------\n"
4736     "b : scalar or ndarray\n"
4737     "    The value of the shape parameter `b` such that `betainc(a, b, x) = p`.\n"
4738     "\n"
4739     "See Also\n"
4740     "--------\n"
4741     "btdtria : Inverse of the beta cumulative distribution function, with respect to `a`.\n"
4742     "\n"
4743     "Notes\n"
4744     "-----\n"
4745     "Wrapper for the CDFLIB [1]_ Fortran routine `cdfbet`.\n"
4746     "\n"
4747     "The cumulative distribution function `p` is computed using a routine by\n"
4748     "DiDinato and Morris [2]_. Computation of `b` involves a search for a value\n"
4749     "that produces the desired value of `p`. The search relies on the\n"
4750     "monotonicity of `p` with `b`.\n"
4751     "\n"
4752     "References\n"
4753     "----------\n"
4754     ".. [1] Barry Brown, James Lovato, and Kathy Russell,\n"
4755     "       CDFLIB: Library of Fortran Routines for Cumulative Distribution\n"
4756     "       Functions, Inverses, and Other Parameters.\n"
4757     ".. [2] DiDinato, A. R. and Morris, A. H.,\n"
4758     "       Algorithm 708: Significant Digit Computation of the Incomplete Beta\n"
4759     "       Function Ratios. ACM Trans. Math. Softw. 18 (1993), 360-373.")
4760 ufunc_btdtrib_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
4761 ufunc_btdtrib_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
4762 ufunc_btdtrib_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4763 ufunc_btdtrib_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4764 ufunc_btdtrib_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4765 ufunc_btdtrib_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4766 ufunc_btdtrib_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4767 ufunc_btdtrib_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4768 ufunc_btdtrib_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4769 ufunc_btdtrib_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4770 ufunc_btdtrib_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_btdtrib
4771 ufunc_btdtrib_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"btdtrib")
4772 ufunc_btdtrib_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_btdtrib
4773 ufunc_btdtrib_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"btdtrib")
4774 ufunc_btdtrib_data[0] = &ufunc_btdtrib_ptr[2*0]
4775 ufunc_btdtrib_data[1] = &ufunc_btdtrib_ptr[2*1]
4776 btdtrib = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_btdtrib_loops, ufunc_btdtrib_data, ufunc_btdtrib_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "btdtrib", ufunc_btdtrib_doc, 0)
4777 
4778 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_chdtr_loops[2]
4779 cdef void *ufunc_chdtr_ptr[4]
4780 cdef void *ufunc_chdtr_data[2]
4781 cdef char ufunc_chdtr_types[6]
4782 cdef char *ufunc_chdtr_doc = (
4783     "chdtr(v, x, out=None)\n"
4784     "\n"
4785     "Chi square cumulative distribution function.\n"
4786     "\n"
4787     "Returns the area under the left tail (from 0 to `x`) of the Chi\n"
4788     "square probability density function with `v` degrees of freedom:\n"
4789     "\n"
4790     ".. math::\n"
4791     "\n"
4792     "    \\frac{1}{2^{v/2} \\Gamma(v/2)} \\int_0^x t^{v/2 - 1} e^{-t/2} dt\n"
4793     "\n"
4794     "Here :math:`\\Gamma` is the Gamma function; see `gamma`. This\n"
4795     "integral can be expressed in terms of the regularized lower\n"
4796     "incomplete gamma function `gammainc` as\n"
4797     "``gammainc(v / 2, x / 2)``. [1]_\n"
4798     "\n"
4799     "Parameters\n"
4800     "----------\n"
4801     "v : array_like\n"
4802     "    Degrees of freedom.\n"
4803     "x : array_like\n"
4804     "    Upper bound of the integral.\n"
4805     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4806     "    Optional output array for the function results.\n"
4807     "\n"
4808     "Returns\n"
4809     "-------\n"
4810     "scalar or ndarray\n"
4811     "    Values of the cumulative distribution function.\n"
4812     "\n"
4813     "See Also\n"
4814     "--------\n"
4815     "chdtrc, chdtri, chdtriv, gammainc\n"
4816     "\n"
4817     "References\n"
4818     "----------\n"
4819     ".. [1] Chi-Square distribution,\n"
4820     "    https://www.itl.nist.gov/div898/handbook/eda/section3/eda3666.htm\n"
4821     "\n"
4822     "Examples\n"
4823     "--------\n"
4824     ">>> import numpy as np\n"
4825     ">>> import scipy.special as sc\n"
4826     "\n"
4827     "It can be expressed in terms of the regularized lower incomplete\n"
4828     "gamma function.\n"
4829     "\n"
4830     ">>> v = 1\n"
4831     ">>> x = np.arange(4)\n"
4832     ">>> sc.chdtr(v, x)\n"
4833     "array([0.        , 0.68268949, 0.84270079, 0.91673548])\n"
4834     ">>> sc.gammainc(v / 2, x / 2)\n"
4835     "array([0.        , 0.68268949, 0.84270079, 0.91673548])")
4836 ufunc_chdtr_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_ff_f
4837 ufunc_chdtr_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_dd_d
4838 ufunc_chdtr_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4839 ufunc_chdtr_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4840 ufunc_chdtr_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4841 ufunc_chdtr_types[3] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4842 ufunc_chdtr_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4843 ufunc_chdtr_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4844 ufunc_chdtr_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_xsf_chdtr
4845 ufunc_chdtr_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chdtr")
4846 ufunc_chdtr_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_xsf_chdtr
4847 ufunc_chdtr_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chdtr")
4848 ufunc_chdtr_data[0] = &ufunc_chdtr_ptr[2*0]
4849 ufunc_chdtr_data[1] = &ufunc_chdtr_ptr[2*1]
4850 chdtr = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_chdtr_loops, ufunc_chdtr_data, ufunc_chdtr_types, 2, 2, 1, 0, "chdtr", ufunc_chdtr_doc, 0)
4851 
4852 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_chdtrc_loops[2]
4853 cdef void *ufunc_chdtrc_ptr[4]
4854 cdef void *ufunc_chdtrc_data[2]
4855 cdef char ufunc_chdtrc_types[6]
4856 cdef char *ufunc_chdtrc_doc = (
4857     "chdtrc(v, x, out=None)\n"
4858     "\n"
4859     "Chi square survival function.\n"
4860     "\n"
4861     "Returns the area under the right hand tail (from `x` to infinity)\n"
4862     "of the Chi square probability density function with `v` degrees of\n"
4863     "freedom:\n"
4864     "\n"
4865     ".. math::\n"
4866     "\n"
4867     "    \\frac{1}{2^{v/2} \\Gamma(v/2)} \\int_x^\\infty t^{v/2 - 1} e^{-t/2} dt\n"
4868     "\n"
4869     "Here :math:`\\Gamma` is the Gamma function; see `gamma`. This\n"
4870     "integral can be expressed in terms of the regularized upper\n"
4871     "incomplete gamma function `gammaincc` as\n"
4872     "``gammaincc(v / 2, x / 2)``. [1]_\n"
4873     "\n"
4874     "Parameters\n"
4875     "----------\n"
4876     "v : array_like\n"
4877     "    Degrees of freedom.\n"
4878     "x : array_like\n"
4879     "    Lower bound of the integral.\n"
4880     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4881     "    Optional output array for the function results.\n"
4882     "\n"
4883     "Returns\n"
4884     "-------\n"
4885     "scalar or ndarray\n"
4886     "    Values of the survival function.\n"
4887     "\n"
4888     "See Also\n"
4889     "--------\n"
4890     "chdtr, chdtri, chdtriv, gammaincc\n"
4891     "\n"
4892     "References\n"
4893     "----------\n"
4894     ".. [1] Chi-Square distribution,\n"
4895     "    https://www.itl.nist.gov/div898/handbook/eda/section3/eda3666.htm\n"
4896     "\n"
4897     "Examples\n"
4898     "--------\n"
4899     ">>> import numpy as np\n"
4900     ">>> import scipy.special as sc\n"
4901     "\n"
4902     "It can be expressed in terms of the regularized upper incomplete\n"
4903     "gamma function.\n"
4904     "\n"
4905     ">>> v = 1\n"
4906     ">>> x = np.arange(4)\n"
4907     ">>> sc.chdtrc(v, x)\n"
4908     "array([1.        , 0.31731051, 0.15729921, 0.08326452])\n"
4909     ">>> sc.gammaincc(v / 2, x / 2)\n"
4910     "array([1.        , 0.31731051, 0.15729921, 0.08326452])")
4911 ufunc_chdtrc_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_ff_f
4912 ufunc_chdtrc_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_dd_d
4913 ufunc_chdtrc_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4914 ufunc_chdtrc_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4915 ufunc_chdtrc_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4916 ufunc_chdtrc_types[3] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4917 ufunc_chdtrc_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4918 ufunc_chdtrc_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4919 ufunc_chdtrc_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_xsf_chdtrc
4920 ufunc_chdtrc_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chdtrc")
4921 ufunc_chdtrc_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_xsf_chdtrc
4922 ufunc_chdtrc_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chdtrc")
4923 ufunc_chdtrc_data[0] = &ufunc_chdtrc_ptr[2*0]
4924 ufunc_chdtrc_data[1] = &ufunc_chdtrc_ptr[2*1]
4925 chdtrc = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_chdtrc_loops, ufunc_chdtrc_data, ufunc_chdtrc_types, 2, 2, 1, 0, "chdtrc", ufunc_chdtrc_doc, 0)
4926 
4927 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_chdtri_loops[2]
4928 cdef void *ufunc_chdtri_ptr[4]
4929 cdef void *ufunc_chdtri_data[2]
4930 cdef char ufunc_chdtri_types[6]
4931 cdef char *ufunc_chdtri_doc = (
4932     "chdtri(v, p, out=None)\n"
4933     "\n"
4934     "Inverse to `chdtrc` with respect to `x`.\n"
4935     "\n"
4936     "Returns `x` such that ``chdtrc(v, x) == p``.\n"
4937     "\n"
4938     "Parameters\n"
4939     "----------\n"
4940     "v : array_like\n"
4941     "    Degrees of freedom.\n"
4942     "p : array_like\n"
4943     "    Probability.\n"
4944     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
4945     "    Optional output array for the function results.\n"
4946     "\n"
4947     "Returns\n"
4948     "-------\n"
4949     "x : scalar or ndarray\n"
4950     "    Value so that the probability a Chi square random variable\n"
4951     "    with `v` degrees of freedom is greater than `x` equals `p`.\n"
4952     "\n"
4953     "See Also\n"
4954     "--------\n"
4955     "chdtrc, chdtr, chdtriv\n"
4956     "\n"
4957     "References\n"
4958     "----------\n"
4959     ".. [1] Chi-Square distribution,\n"
4960     "    https://www.itl.nist.gov/div898/handbook/eda/section3/eda3666.htm\n"
4961     "\n"
4962     "Examples\n"
4963     "--------\n"
4964     ">>> import scipy.special as sc\n"
4965     "\n"
4966     "It inverts `chdtrc`.\n"
4967     "\n"
4968     ">>> v, p = 1, 0.3\n"
4969     ">>> sc.chdtrc(v, sc.chdtri(v, p))\n"
4970     "0.3\n"
4971     ">>> x = 1\n"
4972     ">>> sc.chdtri(v, sc.chdtrc(v, x))\n"
4973     "1.0")
4974 ufunc_chdtri_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_ff_f
4975 ufunc_chdtri_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_dd__As_dd_d
4976 ufunc_chdtri_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4977 ufunc_chdtri_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4978 ufunc_chdtri_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
4979 ufunc_chdtri_types[3] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4980 ufunc_chdtri_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4981 ufunc_chdtri_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
4982 ufunc_chdtri_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_xsf_chdtri
4983 ufunc_chdtri_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chdtri")
4984 ufunc_chdtri_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_xsf_chdtri
4985 ufunc_chdtri_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chdtri")
4986 ufunc_chdtri_data[0] = &ufunc_chdtri_ptr[2*0]
4987 ufunc_chdtri_data[1] = &ufunc_chdtri_ptr[2*1]
4988 chdtri = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_chdtri_loops, ufunc_chdtri_data, ufunc_chdtri_types, 2, 2, 1, 0, "chdtri", ufunc_chdtri_doc, 0)

4990 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_chdtriv_loops[2]
4991 cdef void *ufunc_chdtriv_ptr[4]
4992 cdef void *ufunc_chdtriv_data[2]
4993 cdef char ufunc_chdtriv_types[6]
4994 cdef char *ufunc_chdtriv_doc = (
4995     "chdtriv(p, x, out=None)\n"
4996     "\n"
4997     "Inverse to `chdtr` with respect to `v`.\n"
4998     "\n"
4999     "Returns `v` such that ``chdtr(v, x) == p``.\n"
5000     "\n"
5001     "Parameters\n"
5002     "----------\n"
5003     "p : array_like\n"
5004     "    Probability that the Chi square random variable is less than\n"
5005     "    or equal to `x`.\n"
5006     "x : array_like\n"
5007     "    Nonnegative input.\n"
5008     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
5009     "    Optional output array for the function results.\n"
5010     "\n"
5011     "Returns\n"
5012     "-------\n"
5013     "scalar or ndarray\n"
5014     "    Degrees of freedom.\n"
5015     "\n"
5016     "See Also\n"
5017     "--------\n"
5018     "chdtr, chdtrc, chdtri\n"
5019     "\n"
5020     "References\n"
5021     "----------\n"
5022     ".. [1] Chi-Square distribution,\n"
5023     "    https://www.itl.nist.gov/div898/handbook/eda/section3/eda3666.htm\n"
5024     "\n"
5025     "Examples\n"
5026     "--------\n"
5027     ">>> import scipy.special as sc\n"
5028     "\n"
5029     "It inverts `chdtr`.\n"
5030     "\n"
5031     ">>> p, x = 0.5, 1\n"
5032     ">>> sc.chdtr(sc.chdtriv(p, x), x)\n"
5033     "0.5000000000202172\n"
5034     ">>> v = 1\n"
5035     ">>> sc.chdtriv(sc.chdtr(v, x), v)\n"
5036     "1.0000000000000013")

5052 
5053 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_chndtr_loops[2]
5054 cdef void *ufunc_chndtr_ptr[4]
5055 cdef void *ufunc_chndtr_data[2]
5056 cdef char ufunc_chndtr_types[8]
5057 cdef char *ufunc_chndtr_doc = (
5058     "chndtr(x, df, nc, out=None)\n"
5059     "\n"
5060     "Non-central chi square cumulative distribution function\n"
5061     "\n"
5062     "The cumulative distribution function is given by:\n"
5063     "\n"
5064     ".. math::\n"
5065     "\n"
5066     "    P(\\chi^{\\prime 2} \\vert \\nu, \\lambda) =\\sum_{j=0}^{\\infty}\n"
5067     "    e^{-\\lambda /2}\n"
5068     "    \\frac{(\\lambda /2)^j}{j!} P(\\chi^{\\prime 2} \\vert \\nu + 2j),\n"
5069     "\n"
5070     "where :math:`\\nu > 0` is the degrees of freedom (``df``) and\n"
5071     ":math:`\\lambda \\geq 0` is the non-centrality parameter (``nc``).\n"
5072     "\n"
5073     "Parameters\n"
5074     "----------\n"
5075     "x : array_like\n"
5076     "    Upper bound of the integral; must satisfy ``x >= 0``\n"
5077     "df : array_like\n"
5078     "    Degrees of freedom; must satisfy ``df > 0``\n"
5079     "nc : array_like\n"
5080     "    Non-centrality parameter; must satisfy ``nc >= 0``\n"
5081     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
5082     "    Optional output array for the function results\n"
5083     "\n"
5084     "Returns\n"
5085     "-------\n"
5086     "x : scalar or ndarray\n"
5087     "    Value of the non-central chi square cumulative distribution function.\n"
5088     "\n"
5089     "See Also\n"
5090     "--------\n"
5091     "chndtrix, chndtridf, chndtrinc")
5092 ufunc_chndtr_loops[0] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_fff_f
5093 ufunc_chndtr_loops[1] = <np.PyUFuncGenericFunction>loop_d_ddd__As_ddd_d
5094 ufunc_chndtr_types[0] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
5095 ufunc_chndtr_types[1] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
5096 ufunc_chndtr_types[2] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
5097 ufunc_chndtr_types[3] = <char>NPY_FLOAT
5098 ufunc_chndtr_types[4] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
5099 ufunc_chndtr_types[5] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
5100 ufunc_chndtr_types[6] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
5101 ufunc_chndtr_types[7] = <char>NPY_DOUBLE
5102 ufunc_chndtr_ptr[2*0] = <void*>_func_chndtr
5103 ufunc_chndtr_ptr[2*0+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chndtr")
5104 ufunc_chndtr_ptr[2*1] = <void*>_func_chndtr
5105 ufunc_chndtr_ptr[2*1+1] = <void*>(<char*>"chndtr")
5106 ufunc_chndtr_data[0] = &ufunc_chndtr_ptr[2*0]
5107 ufunc_chndtr_data[1] = &ufunc_chndtr_ptr[2*1]
5108 chndtr = np.PyUFunc_FromFuncAndData(ufunc_chndtr_loops, ufunc_chndtr_data, ufunc_chndtr_types, 2, 3, 1, 0, "chndtr", ufunc_chndtr_doc, 0)

5110 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_chndtridf_loops[2]
5111 cdef void *ufunc_chndtridf_ptr[4]
5112 cdef void *ufunc_chndtridf_data[2]
5113 cdef char ufunc_chndtridf_types[8]
5114 cdef char *ufunc_chndtridf_doc = (
5115     "chndtridf(x, p, nc, out=None)\n"
5116     "\n"
5117     "Inverse to `chndtr` vs `df`\n"
5118     "\n"
5119     "Calculated using a search to find a value for `df` that produces the\n"
5120     "desired value of `p`.\n"
5121     "\n"
5122     "Parameters\n"
5123     "----------\n"
5124     "x : array_like\n"
5125     "    Upper bound of the integral; must satisfy ``x >= 0``\n"
5126     "p : array_like\n"
5127     "    Probability; must satisfy ``0 <= p < 1``\n"
5128     "nc : array_like\n"
5129     "    Non-centrality parameter; must satisfy ``nc >= 0``\n"
5130     "out : ndarray, optional\n"
5131     "    Optional output array for the function results\n"
5132     "\n"
5133     "Returns\n"
5134     "-------\n"
5135     "df : scalar or ndarray\n"
5136     "    Degrees of freedom\n"
5137     "\n"
5138     "See Also\n"
5139     "--------\n"
5140     "chndtr, chndtrix, chndtrinc")

5208 cdef np.PyUFuncGenericFunction ufunc_chndtrix_loops[2]
